content.body: Yes, but be careful that `import foo; export default foo` only works if the module actually has a default export
content.formatted_body: Yes, but be careful that import foo; export default foo only works if the module actually has a default export

content.body: so the redirect module has to be dependant on the input module
* so the redirect module has to be dependant on the module you are redirecting

m.new_content.body: so the redirect module has to be dependant on the module you are redirecting

content.body: Also, you need to use `export { default } from "X"` otherwise you break the live binding
content.formatted_body: Also, you need to use export { default } from "X" otherwise you break the live binding
